title: Ivan's Childhood (1962) CRITERION NTSC DVD9
description:
Ivan's Childhood (1962) NTSC DVD9 Criterion 

         (Full DVD, nothing has been stripped)
			

           :: RELEASE INFO :: 

 Release date.......: 2008-10-XX
 DVD release date...: 2007-XX-XX   
 IMDB url...........: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056111/
 More info..........: http://www.criterion.com/asp/release.asp?id=397 
 IMDB rating........: 8.2/10 
 Genre..............: Drama | War
 
 Synopsis...........: The debut feature from the great Andrei Tarkovsky, 
		      Ivan's Childhood is an evocative, poetic journey 
		      through the shadows and shards of one boy's war-torn 
		      youth. Moving back and forth between the traumatic 
                      realities of WWII and the serene moments of family life 
		      before the conflict began, Tarkovsky's film remains 
		      one of the most jarring and unforgettable depictions 
		      of the impact of violence on children in wartime.

 Source.............: Retail, Region 1
 Format.............: NTSC
 Aspect ratio.......: 1.33:1 

 Main movie.........: Untouched
 Menus..............: Untouched
 
 Special Features...: Untouched
	              * Video appreciation of filmmaker Andrei Tarkovsky 
		      and Ivan's Childhood, featuring Vida T. Johnson, 
		      coauthor of The Films of Andrei Tarkovsky: 
		      A Visual Fugue New video interviews with 
		      cinematographer Vadim Yusov and actor Nikolai Burlyaev
    		      
               	       	     		
 Audio..............: Russian 1.0
		      			
 Subtitles..........: English
        	
 Runtime............: 95 minutes (Black & White)

 Tools used.........: AnyDVD + Dvd Decrypter 
 
 Region free........: Yes
	
 Additional notes...: About time this classic released in the 
	              Criterion Collection is relased here. 
		      Will have initial-seeding turned on 
		      until sufficient number of people have 
		      reached 100%. Then the seeding is UP TO YOu! 
		      Let's keep this classic alive! Enjoy! :)
